amendment.description: Amendment deletes section 6 of the resolution which provides that the provisions of sections 6 and 7 of the War Powers Resolution shall not apply during the remainder of the 106th Congress to a measure introduced pursuant to section 5 of the War Powers Resolution with respect to the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 6 that specifies that the provisions of sections 6 and 7 of the War Powers Resolution shall not apply during the remainder of the 106th Congress to a measure introduced pursuant to section 5 of the War Powers Resolution with respect to the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dreier amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
